original_text: So the Egyptian man took David to find the Amalekites. The men were sitting everywhere, all over the ground. They were having a party, eating and drinking. They were happy because they had taken so many things from the towns of the Philistines and from the people in Judah.
korean_text: 그가 다윗을 인도하여 내려가니 그들이 온 땅에 편만하여 블레셋 사람들의 땅과 유다 땅에서 크게 약탈하였음으로 말미암아 먹고 마시며 춤추는지라

sentences.original_text: So the Egyptian man took David
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이집트 사람은 다윗을 데리고 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: because they had taken so many things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너무 많은 것을 가져갔기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: from the towns of the Philistines
and from the people in Judah
